mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hewes, David T. to Wheat, James S.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hewes, David T.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Jas S Wheat Adjt Genl Wheeling July 23 1861. By Telegraph, from Clarksburg 23 1861. I Have frequently seen Col Frazier here who says he has been appointed got the purpose of getting up the Fourth Regiment he is not the man for the place. I would therefore recommend the appointment of Col Cyrus Vance a gentleman every way qualified & who will get up a the regiment in a very short time. D.T. Hewes 57D176paid. [page 2] Col Hewes Clarksburg July 23
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hewes, David T.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Wheat, James S.
